title: Quantitative Data Analysis Using SPSS: Case-Based Learning and Infographic Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practice-centered education in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment using case-based learning and infographics

learning_goals: Learners analyze quantitative data using SPSS based on real research cases.
Learners interpret infographics to visually represent analytical results.
Learners solve practical problems by applying a four-stage research process: problem definition → data collection → analysis execution → result interpretation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
